name: Untextured Minigame Project
description:
These minigames are part of a design experiment that's currently in progress.

Instead of health or lives, these games use a rewind system. When you'd get a game over, the game freezes and goes into rewind mode. Use the left and right arrows to choose the moment to resume from, then press C to re-enter the game.

You can adjust the game speed and rewind limit in the pause menu (Escape). If you happen to make a big mistake that isn't a game over, you can force a rewind from the pause menu too.

Individual game controls are displayed at the bottom of the frame. In some games, pressing and holding a key is different from tapping it quickly.

We'll be adding more games, so check back later!
